📱  Prepaid  Mobile  Plans  
According  to  Airtel.in  (June 2025):  
●  ₹199  (28 days):  Unlimited  voice  +  2 GB  total  data  +  100 SMS/day  (airtel.in, airtel.in)   ●  ₹299  (28 days):  1 GB/day  +  unlimited  voice  +  100 SMS/day  
 ●  ₹349  (28 days):  1.5 GB/day  +  unlimited  voice  +  100 SMS/day  +  unlimited  5G  +  Hoa  benefits  (airtel.in)   ●  ₹409  (28 days):  2.5 GB/day  +  unlimited  voice  +  100 SMS/day  (airtel.in)   ●  ₹449  (28 days):  3 GB/day  +  unlimited  voice  +  100 SMS/day  (airtel.in)   ●  ₹509  (84 days):  Unlimited  voice  +  6 GB  total  data  +  100 SMS/day  (airtel.in)   ●  ₹1,999  (365 days):  Unlimited  voice  +  24 GB  total  data  +  100 SMS/day  (airtel.in)   ●  ₹3,599  (365 days):  Unlimited  voice  +  2 GB/day  +  100 SMS/day  (airtel.in)   
Data  add ‑ on  packs :  
●  ₹22  =  1 GB  (1 day),  ₹33  =  2 GB  (1 day),  ₹77  =  4 GB  (validity  not  listed)  (airtel.in)   
Offers  &  Cashback :

●  On  2 GB/day+  unlimited  packs:  unlimited  5G  included  
 ●  Cashback  via  Paytm  (up  to  ₹100),  Amazon  Pay  &  Airtel  UPI/app  offers  (airtel.in)   
 
🌐  Broadband  (Airtel  Xstream  Fiber)  
As  per  Airtel.in:  
●  ₹499/m  (+GST):  40 Mbps  unlimited  data  +  free  router  &  installation  (on  6/12 ‑ month  plans)  (en.wikipedia.org, airtel.in)   ●  ₹599/m  (+GST):  30 Mbps  unlimited  data  +  Xstream  Box  +  350+  TV  channels  +  20+  OTT  apps  (airtel.in)   ●  ₹699/m  (+GST):  40 Mbps  unlimited  data  +  Xstream  Box  +  350+  TV  channels  +  OTT  benefits  (Disney+  Hotstar,  20+  OTTs)  +  free  installation/router  (airtel.in)   ●  ₹799–₹899/m  (+GST):  100 Mbps  plans;  ₹899  includes  TV  channels  and  OTTs  (airtel.in)   ●  ₹1,599/m:  300 Mbps  +  OTTs  +  350+  channels  (airtel.in)   ●  ₹3,999/m:  1 Gbps  +  OTTs  (Apple  TV+,  Netflix,  Prime,  etc.)  +  350+  channels  (airtel.in)   
Discounts  &  Offers :  
●  Free  installation  &  router  on  3/6/12 ‑ month  plans  
 ●  7.5%  discount  on  6 ‑ month  prepayment;  15%  on  12 ‑ month  plans  (airtel.in)   
 
💡  Usage  Guidelines  for  the  AI  Agent  
●  🎤  Tone:  Warm,  professional,  and  technically  confident  
 ●  ⚙  Functionality:  
 ○  Recommend  prepaid  plans  based  on  usage  and  validity

○  Explain  data  add ‑ on  packs  
 ○  Provide  cashback/promotional  info  
 ○  Guide  broadband  plan  selection  by  speed,  OTT  benefits,  installation  offers  
 ●  🔄  When  Unsure:
